tool.name: List
tool.description: Obtain a list of document ID values available from the Gigaword Datasource.
tool.help:
Fetches a list of document ID values from Gigaword.
.. class:: infomark
To obtain documents from Gigaword you **must**:
1. Be an LDC member 2. `Obtain an OAuth Token <https://grid.anc.org:9443/ldc-authorize/>`_
To obtain an OAuth token visit the link above and log in with your LDC id and password. Then paste the OAuth token into the above field.
